features: Lined Stationary Set for Writing Letters: Add a decorative and personal touch to your letter writing, party invitations, or greeting cards with this vintage-style stationary set
Easy Customization: Each sheet of gold letterhead writing paper features an aged vintage-style design that has a sizable space to add text, pictures, drawings, and heartfelt messages
Printer-Friendly: Each sheet of vintage-style stationary paper measures 8.5 x 11 inches and is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers: simply create your design and print
Reliable Quality: The personalized stationery has lines printed on the front and is blank on the backside; use pens, marker, stamps, or paint to create a unique and personalized message
What's included: Includes 48 sheets of ivory lined stationary writing paper, so you'll have plenty of paper to write all your letters and notes without running out anytime soon
body.description: Put pen to paper and express your emotions in a classic and vintage-style way with our stationery paper. With its antique, old-fashioned, and fancy design, this aged-style ivory paper with a gold border provides a touch of elegance and sophistication to your writing. Ideal for pen pal supplies, Christmas letter paper, and fancy calligraphy paper, this vintage-style lined paper brings a touch of nostalgia and warmth to any handwritten message. Imagine using this paper to write a letter from Santa, a heartfelt message to a loved one, or to express your love in the form of wedding vows. Crafted to perfection, this classic and vintage-style paper is letter size (8.5 x 11 in), making it great for all your writing needs. Whether you're writing a personal letter or a professional document, this ruled stationery paper is an excellent choice. This lined stationary paper is not only beautiful but also versatile. You can use it for vintage-style airmail stationary, creating unique invitations or announcements, or even for scrapbooking. Let your words come to life with our fancy lined paper. Ideal for any occasion, this paper captures the essence of a bygone era while still providing a touch of modernity. So, indulge in the art of writing and create a timeless masterpiece that will be treasured for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely writing paper
reviews.reviewText: I don't write letters much anymore, but I needed to write one and this paper was perfect. I can't write in a straight line so the lines were needed. The paper is a good quality thickness and made a nice presentation of my 4 page letter. Now what to do with the rest of the paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: The stationary was thick and sturdy - great for writing letters to my bridesmaids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lined and bordered Stationary
reviews.reviewText: It is a gift to a friend. She uses the paper in her correspondence and appreciates the lines, the weight of the paper and the decorative border

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the money
reviews.reviewText: Good quality paper. Good spacing between lines. Decorative edging was not gaudy; I used this stationery to send a farewell letter to my pastor. Only negative is that there were no envelopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my letters/correspondence
reviews.reviewText: Paper is nice quality and thickness, my ink pen does not bleed thru which is essential. Perfect for my letter writing (JW)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you like beautiful old looking stationary, go for it. I am very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I needed. Our temple does a card signing for our ministers- signing on the lovely paper. Great product.
Very useful for that special writing project good quality paper and very generic design. I look forward to using it for special writes. You also get a goodly amount of thicker quality paper.
I loved this stationary. I write to Pen Pals so its nice to write lengthy letters on this very nice stationary.Going to order another package when I'm done with this one.
